description: We usually spend numerous hours reading each day. You will double your reading speed – at the same level of comprehension – after having completed this course. In a study with 1378 people, the PoweReading system by bestselling author Zach Davis produced an average increase in reading speed of 124.5 % at a 4 % higher comprehention rate. Your experienced trainer Zach Davis teaches you maximum reading efficiency. Start to save time with your improved reading skills now!
title: Power Reading - Speed Reading Techniques
